publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-905# Brian Adam: Satrosphere Science Centre-That the Parliament welcomes the review of science education in Scotland; supports the role that science centres such as Satrosphere in Aberdeen play, and considers that the Scottish Executive should financially support these centres on a fair and equitable basis. Supported by: Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Robin Harper*, Richard Lochhead*, Rosie Kane*, Bruce Crawford*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Rob Gibson*, Fergus Ewing*, Shiona Baird*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr David Davidson*, Tricia Marwick*, Ms Sandra White*
S2M-905# Satrosphere Science Centre (lodged on 11 February 2004) Robert Brown*, Nora Radcliffe*

S2M-905# Brian Adam: Satrosphere Science Centre-That the Parliament welcomes the review of science *centres* in Scotland; supports the role that science centres such as Satrosphere in Aberdeen play, and considers that the Scottish Executive should financially support these centres on a fair and equitable basis. Supported by: Mr Stewart Maxwell, Robin Harper, Richard Lochhead, Rosie Kane, Bruce Crawford, Roseanna Cunningham, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Rob Gibson, Fergus Ewing, Shiona Baird, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr David Davidson, Tricia Marwick, Ms Sandra White, Robert Brown, Nora Radcliffe
S2M-905# Satrosphere Science Centre (lodged on 11 February 2004) Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-905# Satrosphere Science Centre (lodged on 11 February 2004) Donald Gorrie*
